me_no_target: You see no reason to sniff.
me_self: You sniff sadly at your lost opportunities.
actor_self: $n sniffs sadly at $mself.  Something MUST be bothering $m.
actor_other: $n sniffs sadly at the way $N is treating $m.
actor_me: $n sniffs sadly at the way you are treating $m.
me_actor: You sniff sadly at the way $E is treating you.
